QuestData.Title: Hard Lock Life
QuestData.Description:
The security in the forge is stricter than in any other area of Tyrhold. This will be quite a challenge for us, $c.
Only certain units around the citadel have the capability to bypass this security, and the protocols to unlock require more than one code in case of corruption.
These units will not want to relinquish their overrides, you may have to take them by force. Be careful, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Primary Security Disc and Secondary Security Disc within Tyrhold.
